statements: UPDATE inventory_reports SET sales_trend = 0.8 WHERE report_id = 1;

UPDATE sales_trends SET sales_amount = 200.50, sales_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE inventory_reports SET quantity = quantity + 10, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, product_name = 'updated product' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales_trends SET sales_amount = sales_amount * 1.1, sales_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_name = 'new_product';
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE item_id = 100
UPDATE Sales SET sale_amount = 150.00, sale_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE sale_id = 500
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE Sales SET sale_amount = 50.25, sale_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE sale_id = 3;

UPDATE inventory_reports SET inventory_level = 1000 WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND report_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE sales_reports SET units_sold = 50, revenue = 5000.75 WHERE product_name = 'iPhone' AND report_id = 101;
UPDATE Inventory SET Quantity = Quantity + 1 WHERE ProductID = 1001;
UPDATE Sales SET SaleAmount = 150.75, SaleDate = '2022-09-15' WHERE SalesID = 2003;
UPDATE Inventory SET Quantity = Quantity + 10, Price = 15.99 WHERE ProductID = 1001;
